title: [JIT] Python operations (e.g. Dropout) traced in wrong mode
body_html:
Code example:

import torch
import torch.nn.functional as F

@torch.jit.trace(torch.zeros(1, 2, 3))
def dropout_test(x):
    x = torch.neg(x)
    return F.dropout(x)

dropout_test(torch.zeros(1, 2, 3, requires_grad=True))

Output:

17:20:04 ~ $ python dropoutcrash.py
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "dropoutcrash.py", line 9, in <module>
    dropout_test(torch.zeros(1, 2, 3, requires_grad=True))
RuntimeError:
VariableType::ID() not implemented:
operation failed in interpreter:
/Users/jamesreed/onnx-fairseq/pytorch/torch/nn/functional.py(555): dropout
dropoutcrash.py(7): dropout_test
/Users/jamesreed/onnx-fairseq/pytorch/torch/jit/__init__.py(475): wrapper
dropoutcrash.py(4): <module>

Discussed with @zdevito offline, this appears to the the tracer tracing this op in the wrong mode, and two things are incorrect:

  1. The tracing_autograd_python_function flag is set
  2. The op has a Handle output

Code example:
import torch
import torch.nn.functional as F

@torch.jit.trace(torch.zeros(1, 2, 3))
def dropout_test(x):
    x = torch.neg(x)
    return F.dropout(x)

dropout_test(torch.zeros(1, 2, 3, requires_grad=True))

Output:
17:20:04 ~ $ python dropoutcrash.py
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "dropoutcrash.py", line 9, in <module>
    dropout_test(torch.zeros(1, 2, 3, requires_grad=True))

Discussed with @zdevito offline, this appears to the the tracer tracing this op in the wrong mode, and two things are incorrect:

The tracing_autograd_python_function flag is set
The op has a Handle output
body:
Code example:

```
import torch
import torch.nn.functional as F

@torch.jit.trace(torch.zeros(1, 2, 3))
def dropout_test(x):
    x = torch.neg(x)
    return F.dropout(x)

dropout_test(torch.zeros(1, 2, 3, requires_grad=True))
```

Output:
```
17:20:04 ~ $ python dropoutcrash.py
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "dropoutcrash.py", line 9, in <module>
    dropout_test(torch.zeros(1, 2, 3, requires_grad=True))
RuntimeError:
VariableType::ID() not implemented:
operation failed in interpreter:
/Users/jamesreed/onnx-fairseq/pytorch/torch/nn/functional.py(555): dropout
dropoutcrash.py(7): dropout_test
/Users/jamesreed/onnx-fairseq/pytorch/torch/jit/__init__.py(475): wrapper
dropoutcrash.py(4): <module>
```

Discussed with @zdevito offline, this appears to the the tracer tracing this op in the wrong mode, and two things are incorrect:

1) The `tracing_autograd_python_function` flag is set
2) The op has a Handle output
